post:
Hello Guys , 

time to make a last deal in this cheap vps (only 1000 in stock ) and will be the last offer in this price due of ipv4 cost this days. After out of stock please do not pm for more because the LAST is the LAST so if you are lucky i am glad if not ... you lost the train.

let`s go with the offer:

VERRY IMPORTANT !!! THIS IS OPENVZ 6 SO DO NOT TRY TO UPGRADE THE TEMPLATE BECAUSE YOUR VPS WILL BROKE.

Fuse, tun/tap, iptables modules will came by default enabled to avoid future tickets.

Due of huge demand in this products we can have some delays in provide , but once your vps will be provided we will change the next due date to compensate the waiting time.
